value:
With Prince Lyon, we sought to see
into Grado's future. I wished only
to help our people.

The land trembles, many die... That is
the future we saw. Our Sacred Stone
shattered, and Prince Lyon...changed.

The hearts of the Heroes here shine
with a pure light—a courageous light.
So bright it is, I fear I will be blinded.

The revival of that ancient dark
magic was always part of Prince
Lyon's plan...

Mages are not often thought of with
fondness. Many believe we rely on
demons to perform our magic.

Why I was sent here is unknown
to me. I am not suited for such
friendly gestures.$k$p...You agree, do you not?

This, too, is a great punishment.
There are some powers best
left unknown.

To be a mage is to test every
boundary you face. To do
otherwise is against our nature.
In this darkness, there is peace.

Time is like the water of a river:
it flows ever on, never stopping.

I am Knoll...a former royal mage
of Grado. I would prefer to speak
no more about it.

You use the power of other worlds
to wage war... Prince Lyon would
approve, no doubt.$k$pWe read of a spell entitled time shear.
It causes, in effect, a hole in time,
punching through cause and effect.$k$pIt allows you to meddle with time
and other worlds. And here you are,
the full expression of that. If only...$k$pPrince Lyon sought only to help
our people. He foresaw a great
disaster approaching...$k$pThat is but one facet of the power
of time shear. And now...you have
some of that power, Summoner.$k$pTo be frank, I fear that power
of yours. Even so, I wish to see
where you lead this world.
はあっ
Darkness...
ぐっ…
The darkness grows...
The power of darkness.
This is truth.
You will be consumed.
All for naught.
A kind of peace…
Phew...
My name is Knoll. I was one of Grado's top researchers in arcane matters.
If you need something, I would rather you simply call to me.
I was branded a traitor and arrested. I was just one day from execution.
It is said that time flows like a river... Does it follow that you can read that flow? Each ripple, every wave?
There are as many truths in the world as there are people to tell them. Find the truth that speaks to you.
All Prince Lyon wanted was to help people. And we were his servants.
I had lost my way... But as long as I'm with you, I may be able to find it again.
It's no trouble.
Really?
I'll lend a hand.
